venue.name: Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell

item.description:
Meet other local socially progressive Christians in a safe, nurturing place where participants can share their joys and sorrows, support one another, and encourage one another in their daily lives.

Our 10am Sunday worship service includes prayer, music, and an inspiring message. Engaging Christian education classes for school-age children, as well as nursery care, are available during the 10am worship service. Please plan to stay after the service for snacks and to meet some new friends.

Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell is a socially progressive, culturally diverse, Christian church welcoming people from all religious backgrounds, cultures, and lifestyles. We are affiliated with the United Church of Christ (UCC). The church is actively involved in the local community and offers a comprehensive Sunday school program to those with school-age children. http://WeWelcomeAll.o...
